What are you thankful for this week?: Ni iki ushimira muri iki cyumweru?
How did you put into practice the script: Nigute washyize mubikorwa ibyanditswe / inkuru twaze igihe cyashize duhura?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Ninde wasangiye isomo ryicyumweru cyicyumweru kandi byagenze bite?
What needs did you meet in the community: Ni ibihe bikenewe wahuye nayi mu cyumweru gishize?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Saba umuntu gusoma igice igika kimwe icyarimwe.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Gira abagize itsinda ubibwire mumagambo yabo.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Baza itsinda niba bongeyeho cyangwa basize ikintu na kimwe.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Iyo urangije hamwe nibika byose, baza umuntu mumatsinda kuvuga inkuru yose hibuka. Saba itsinda gukosora amakosa yose.
What does this passage tell us about God: Iki gice kitubwira iki ku Mana?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Niba iki gice ari ukuri, niyihe myitwarire tugomba guhinduka muri iki cyumweru?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Ninde uzabwira iyi nkuru muri iki cyumweru?
What needs can we meet in the community: Ni ibihe bikenewe dushobora guterana mu baturage muri iki cyumweru?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Urashaka kuvumbura hamwe ninshuti zawe icyo Imana imeze nuburyo Imana ishaka ko ubaho?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Hano haribibazo bimwe kugirango ibiganiro byawe bitangire.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Urashaka kuvumbura ubwawe kubyo Imana imeze nuburyo Imana ishaka ko ubaho?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Abantu benshi bakunda gukora ubwo buvumbuzi mumatsinda hamwe ninshuti zabo.
